title: JB Smoove
description:
Kevin is joined by comedian and actor JB Smoove on this week’s episode of Comedy Gold Minds. Topics range from working together on The Real Husbands of Hollywood, to how JB got his iconic role starring alongside Larry David on Curb Your Enthusiasm, and how his comedy style found him working with shows like Saturday Night Live and Conan.

Like Comedy Gold Minds? SiriusXM subscribers get it a day early, plus Kevin Hart’s Laugh Out Loud Radio, his 24/7 comedy channel, with great talk shows and stand-up. Learn more / check it out for 3 months at siriusxm.com/comedygoldminds.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Kevin Hart, JB Smoove)
